A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It was literally shocking how afoul this movie went. A classic case of subverting expectations\, not in order to make a better story or set up a bigger payoff\, but just for the sake of being different. I am all for taking chances\, but it seems like the writer/director Rian Johnson simply didn't respect the characters. It was arrogant and self aware the entire movie. I would give it 1 stars if it weren't so pretty at times.
